mapper.insert: insert into user_tbl(user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_addrnum, user_addr user_bir, user_gender) values (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddrnum}, #{userAddr}, #{userBir}, #{userGender})
mapper.update: update user_tbl set user_pass=#{userPass}, user_email=#{userEmail}, user_phone=#{userPhone}, user_addrnum=#{userAddrnum}, user_addr=#{userAddr}, user_bir=#{userBir}, user_gender=#{userGender}
mapper.delete: delete user_tbl where user_id=#{userId} and user_pass=#{userPass}
